vn.map4d.map4dsdk.annotations

Class MFBitmapDescriptorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.map4d.map4dsdk.annotations.MFBitmapDescriptorFactory

  • public final class MFBitmapDescriptorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to create a definition of a Bitmap image, used for marker icons.

      • fromResource

        public static MFBitmapDescriptor fromResource(int resourceId)
        Creates a BitmapDescriptor using the resource ID of a Bitmap image.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - The resource ID of a Bitmap image.
        Returns:
        the BitmapDescriptor that was loaded from the asset, in the case resource is not bitmap an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.

      • defaultMarker

        public static MFBitmapDescriptor defaultMarker()
        Creates a MFBitmapDescriptor that refers to the default marker image.
        Returns:
        the MFBitmapDescriptor object.

      • defaultMarkerView

        public static MFBitmapDescriptor defaultMarkerView()
        Don't use this method. Use in sdk only
        Returns:
